p: Details of antimicrobial prophylaxis are listed in Table 2. None received fluoroquinolone prophylaxis, 52 patients (98%) received antiviral prophylaxis, and 46 (87%) received anti- Pneumocystis prophylaxis. Forty-two patients (79%) were given antifungal prophylaxis, with micafungin (100 mg/d intravenously) the most frequently prescribed agent.
